Two kilometers down this path, there's a
very special park. Usually on this

channel we visit places that are strange,
different, out of the ordinary, that you

would normally not find in a tourist
brochure, and that's exactly what this

place is. We've been wandering these
dusty paths for about half an hour

trying to find this random spot I found
on the internet a couple years ago,

called Parque del los Desvelados, Park of the
Sleepless in English. This particular

place is very interesting. A guy named
Luis Garcia Vidal started a sculpture

park in the middle of nowhere in 1971. He
built something... many of them... for 30

years, and now he's passed away and these
statues are rotting in the wilderness.
We are about to visit...

it might be a bit creepy for some of you you.

Life doesn't last forever, maybe
